summary.para: Queries whether the video processor supports a specified video format.

param.name: Format
param.para: The video format to query, specified as a value.

param.name: pFlags
param.para: Receives a bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the capabilities of the video processor.

param.name: pCaps
param.para: A pointer to a structure that receives the capabilities.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the content description that was used to create this enumerator.

param.name: pContentDesc
param.para: A pointer to a structure that receives the content description.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets a list of custom frame rates that a video processor supports.

param.name: TypeIndex
param.para: The zero-based index of the frame-rate capability group. To get the maxmum index, call and check the RateConversionCapsCount member of the structure.

param.name: CustomRateIndex
param.para: The zero-based index of the custom rate to retrieve. To get the maximum index, call and check the CustomRateCount member of the structure.
This index value is always relative to the capability group specified in the TypeIndex parameter.

param.name: pRate
param.para: A pointer to a structure that receives the custom rate.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the range of values for an image filter.

param.name: Filter
param.para: The type of image filter, specified as a value.

param.name: pRange
param.para: A pointer to a structure. The method fills the structure with the range of values for the specified filter.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Returns a group of video processor capabilities that are associated with frame-rate conversion, including deinterlacing and inverse telecine.

param.name: TypeIndex
param.para: The zero-based index of the group to retrieve. To get the maximum index, call and check the RateConversionCapsCount member of the structure.

param.name: pCaps
param.para: A pointer to a structure that receives the frame-rate conversion capabilities.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The capabilities defined in the structure are interdependent. Therefore, the driver can support multiple, distinct groups of these capabilities.

summary.para: Enumerates the video processor capabilities of a Microsoft Direct3D 11 device.

remarks.para: To get a pointer to this interface, call .
To create an instance of the video processor, pass the ID3D11VideoProcessorEnumerator pointer to the method.
